displayProperties.name: Hail The Storm
displayProperties.description:
Shattering frozen targets and Stasis crystals deals increased damage.

Shattering Stasis crystals releases shards of ice that damage and slow targets.

displayProperties.name: Ferocity
displayProperties.description: If you have not gone flawless this week, losses after three wins reset you to back to three wins.

displayProperties.name: Persistence
displayProperties.description:
Losses following a win remove the win from the card. Reaching seven wins rewards the weekly Adept weapon. Reaching seven wins without having a win removed grants access to the Lighthouse.

This passage cannot be used to focus Adept weapons.

displayProperties.name: Pillar of Ice
displayProperties.description: Defeating a frozen target spawns Stasis crystals.

displayProperties.name: Dual Loader
displayProperties.description: Reloads two additional shots at a time, but reduces reload speed.

displayProperties.name: Bronze Contender's Boon
displayProperties.description:
This buff commemorates a Bronze Tier score in the Guardian Games Competitive Nightfall playlist.

Weapons and abilities empower each other. Defeating combatants with abilities grants increased weapon damage. Defeating combatants with weapons grants increased ability recharge speed. 

Active only in Guardian Games Recreational and Competitive Nightfall playlists. This buff will expire on weekly reset.

displayProperties.name: Loose Change
displayProperties.description: Applying an elemental debuff to a target increases this weapon's reload speed, aim assist, and movement while aiming down sights for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Hatchling
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows or rapidly defeating targets with this weapon spawns a Threadling at the target's location. Improves handling.

displayProperties.name: Loose Change
displayProperties.description: Applying an elemental debuff to a target increases this weapon's reload speed, aim assist, and movement while aiming down sights for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Silver Contender's Boon
displayProperties.description:
This buff commemorates a Silver Tier score in the Guardian Games Competitive playlist.

Weapons and abilities empower each other. Defeating combatants with abilities grants increased weapon damage. Defeating combatants with weapons grants increased ability recharge speed.

Empowerment stacks 3 times.

While at maximum empowerment, defeat combatants to gain a boost to mobility.

Active only in Guardian Games Recreational and Competitive Nightfall playlists. This buff will expire on weekly reset.

displayProperties.name: Hatchling
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows or rapidly defeating targets with this weapon spawns a Threadling at the target's location.

displayProperties.name: Persistence
displayProperties.description:
Losses following a win remove the win from the card. Reaching seven wins rewards the weekly Adept weapon.

This passage cannot be used to focus Adept weapons.

displayProperties.name: Sundering
displayProperties.description:
Destroying vehicles and constructs or breaking target shields grants this weapon bonus reload speed and charge rate.

Constructs include barricades, turrets, Stasis crystals, and other objects created in the field.

displayProperties.name: Stalwart Sigil
displayProperties.description: Adds a stalwart appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Proud Sigil
displayProperties.description: Adds a proud appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Deconstruct
displayProperties.description:
Dealing sustained damage grants bonus damage against vehicles and constructs for an improved duration and refunds ammunition. Damage with Primary ammo or against constructs provides additional progress.

Constructs include barricades, turrets, Stasis crystals, and other objects created in the field.

displayProperties.name: Pillar of Ice
displayProperties.description: Defeating a frozen target spawns Stasis crystals.

displayProperties.name: Gold Contender's Boon
displayProperties.description:
This buff commemorates a Gold Tier score in the Guardian Games Competitive playlist.

Weapons and abilities empower each other. Defeating combatants with abilities grants increased weapon damage. Defeating combatants with weapons grants increased ability recharge speed.

Empowerment stacks 5 times.

While at maximum empowerment, defeat combatants to gain a boost to mobility, accuracy, handling, and reload.

Active only in Guardian Games Recreational and Competitive Nightfall playlists. This buff will expire on weekly reset.

displayProperties.name: Dual Loader
displayProperties.description: Reloads an additional shot at a time, but reduces reload speed.

displayProperties.name: Soaring Fang
displayProperties.description: Ground damage charges; airborne damage extends.

displayProperties.name: Deconstruct
displayProperties.description:
Dealing sustained damage grants bonus damage against vehicles and constructs and refunds ammunition. Damage with Primary ammo or against constructs provides additional progress.

Constructs include barricades, turrets, Stasis crystals, and other objects created in the field.

displayProperties.name: SKIMMER CONTROLS
displayProperties.description:
[Brake]  : Take to the air.
[Crouch]  : Grind the air.

displayProperties.name: Crossing Over
displayProperties.description: This weapon has increased range and handling for the top half of the magazine, while rounds from the bottom half of the magazine deal increased damage.

displayProperties.name: Flying Monster
displayProperties.description: While you are airborne, sustained damage and final blows with this weapon to difficult combatants grant a Void overshield, reduce combatant accuracy, and return ammo to the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Hail The Storm
displayProperties.description:
Shattering frozen targets and Stasis crystals deals increased damage.

Shattering Stasis crystals releases shards of ice that damage and slow targets.

This buff commemorates your Silver Tier score in the Guardian Games: Training or Competitive modes.

Defeating combatants with abilities grants increased weapon damage, while defeating combatants with weapons grants increased ability recharge speed.

Empowerment stacks 3 times.

While at maximum empowerment, defeat combatants to gain a boost to mobility.

This is active only in Guardian Games playlist activities and will expire on weekly reset.

Defeating combatants with abilities grants increased weapon damage, while defeating combatants with weapons grants increased ability recharge speed.

Empowerment stacks 5 times.

While at maximum empowerment, defeat combatants to gain a boost to mobility, accuracy, handling, and reload.

This is active only in Guardian Games playlist activities and will expire on weekly reset.

displayProperties.description:
This buff commemorates your Bronze Tier score in the Guardian Games: Training or Competitive modes.

Defeating combatants with abilities grants increased weapon damage, while defeating combatants with weapons grants increased ability recharge speed. 

This is active only in Guardian Games playlist activities and will expire on weekly reset.
